welcomeLink.header: Option B: Send your campaign invitations with your email application

createDraft.text: You can send the Invitations with your email application by clicking on the button below:

welcomeLink.copyLink: If generating the email does't work, you can copy the following link and paste it in your e-mail invitations.

emailInvite.header: Option A: Send the campaigns invitations with the HealthCampaign Service
emailInvite.subheader: You can directly send email invitations from this page.

step1.title: Send a test invitation (optional)
step1.text: Send a test invitation to yourself to get a preview of the campaign invitation.
step1.success:
Invitation sent to {{ email }}.
Please check the invitation in your inbox.

step3.title: Send Campaign Invitations
step3.text: Please verify the email addresses in the mailing list before you click on the "Send" button.

step1.text: Please check the details of your campaign. Correct or complete information

step2.text: Congratulations! Your campaign is now ready for launch. Send right now the invitations to the campaign participants.

dcmhome.noCampaigns: You have not created any campaigns yet
dcmhome.noMessages: Your messages for the campaign participants are displayed here. Click on CAMPAIGN MESSAGE to compose a message.
dcmhome.noOffers: Once you, as a campaign leader, have recommended to perform an activity to the campaign participants or you, as an organizer, have invited the campaign participants to a joint campaign activity, the offered activities will be displayed here. Click on "Add offer" to offer an activity to the campaign participants.

descriptions.7: By pointing the mouse cursor over the blue "i" icon, the evaluation criterion and the meaning of the characteristics are displayed in the Digital Coach section.
